data.name: Selfmade Devil
data.detailed_description:
Selfmade Devil is a casual semi-placed game with a rich variety of magic objects, enemies, and maps.Players as the demon king in the mysterious girl under the guidance of the cultivation of magic ability, transformation of the demon King city, improve the efficiency of material acquisition, to create a powerful demon king army to invade human territory!
The game features
Super easy to use game flow, simple 2 in 1 upgrade system
Up to 40+ magic forms and 30+ enemies
Slingshot combat mode similar to marbles
Magic city construction will greatly improve efficiency, after level 30 will unlock the automatic synthesis function, free hands, free to hang up
data.about_the_game:
Selfmade Devil is a casual semi-placed game with a rich variety of magic objects, enemies, and maps.Players as the demon king in the mysterious girl under the guidance of the cultivation of magic ability, transformation of the demon King city, improve the efficiency of material acquisition, to create a powerful demon king army to invade human territory!
The game features

Up to 40+ magic forms and 30+ enemies
Slingshot combat mode similar to marbles
Magic city construction will greatly improve efficiency, after level 30 will unlock the automatic synthesis function, free hands, free to hang up
data.short_description: Hang up a magic casual game.
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX650
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
